description:
Keep your gear off the ground, your bag off the floor of the bus, organize your gear closet, the uses for this little carabiner crossed with a gear hook are endless. The Heroclip takes the versatile carabiner and adds a swivelling hook with a grippy Rubber tip. This combo lets you clip your gear to the carabiner and then swivel the hook into place, the grippy rubber keeps the hook from sliding about and protects whatever you are hanging your stuff from.

  • Hook swivels a full 360°
  • Hook folds inward and rotates around the carabiner body for slim and compact package that is easy to take with you
  • Holds up to 18kg
  • Made from aircraft aluminum, glass-reinforced nylon and stainless steel
name: Heroclip Mini Carabiner
